title.rendered: Summer Internship Programme 2025 at NIT Rourkela [May 16-July 15; Unpaid]: Apply by March 28

content.rendered:
Applications are invited for the Summer Internship Programme 2025 at NIT Rourkela. The last date for the application is March 28, 2025!

About NIT Rourkela

NIT Rourkela, a premier institution for technical education in India, was established by the Government of India. It was upgraded from the Regional Engineering College, Rourkela, to a deemed university, now known as the National Institute of Technology, Rourkela.

About the Summer Internship Programme

NIT Rourkela has introduced a Summer Internship Programme aimed at motivating talented B. Tech, B. Arch, B.Sc., M.Sc., and MBA students from various institutes across India, excluding NIT Rourkela, to engage in innovative research and development projects under the mentorship of NITR faculty.

Fellowship and other Facilities

  • Fellowship or other Financial assistance will not be provided.
  • Laboratory, Library Facilities (without borrowing) and internet facilities.
  • Medical facility (consultation with doctor at Institute dispensary).
  • Approximate food and Accommodation cost at NIT Rourkela Hostel: Rs. 8500/- per month

Internship Details

The Internship is available in the following departments:

  • BM: Biotechnology & Medical Engineering
  • CE: Civil Engineering
  • CH: Chemical Engineering
  • CR: Ceramic Engineering
  • CS: Computer Science & Engineering
  • CY: Chemistry
  • EC: Electronics & Communication Engineering
  • EE: Electrical Engineering
  • ER: Earth and Atmospheric Sciences
  • FP: Food Process Engineering
  • HS: Humanities & Social Sciences
  • ID: Industrial Design
  • LB: Library
  • LS: Life Science
  • MA: Mathematics
  • ME: Mechanical Engineering
  • MM: Metallurgical & Materials Engineering
  • MN: Mining Engineering
  • PA: Planning & Architecture
  • PH: Physics and Astronomy
  • SM: School of Management

Depending on available projects floated by the respective departments.

Eligibility Criteria

Any B.Tech., B.Arch., B.Sc., M.Sc. and MBA student with a good academic record who has completed 2 or 3 years of study toward an engineering or science degree may apply for this fellowship.

How to Apply?

The application link will be active on Feb 10, 2025!

Please submit application on-line. The details will appear in the institute website. NIT Rourkela www.nitrkl.ac.in. Applicants will have to check the website for SIP-2024 updates.

Click here to download the recommendation form.

Deadline

The last date of application is: 28th March 2025

Decision

The list of fellows and their supervisors will be announced on the website by 11th April 2025.

Contact Details

  • Prof. Md. Equeenuddin (PIC, Summer Internship Programme -2025)
  • Email id: sip@nitrkl.ac.in
  • Ph: 0661 – 246 2939

Click here to view the official notification of the Summer Internship Programme 2025 at NIT Rourkela.
